Category:Star Wars: Edge of the Empire sourcebooks

nodes.text: Suns of Fortune is an official rules supplement for the Corellian sector in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire roleplaying game. It was published on January 24, 2014.

Suns of Fortune is a 144-page sourcebook for the Star Wars®: Edge of the Empire™ Roleplaying Game that allows you and your friends to explore the fantastic opportunities and dangers found within the Corellian Sector, the birthplace of Han Solo and Wedge Antilles. Discover three new species, exotic weapons, dozens of vehicles, nine modular encounters that Game Masters can use in any Edge of the Empire campaign, and more!
